We Appreciate Your Support!

Sponsorships will be used for the development and deployment of AIOS. All sponsorships will be processed through the Rutgers University Foundation. This partnership ensures complete transparency and adherence to compliance standards in the management and allocation of funds, providing sponsors with confidence in the integrity of their contributions.


Individual Sponsorship


Individual sponsors can donate through the Rutgers University Foundation page at here.
 Individual sponsors will be acknowledged in the AIOS Foundation Annual Report.
Individual sponsors donating at the corporate level will receive benefits at the corporate level.


Corporate Sponsorship


Multiple levels of sponsorship are available for your consideration, accompanied with multiple levels of benefits.
To contribute a corporate sponsorship and gain membership benefits, please contribute at here or contact sponsor@aios.foundation.

Platinum

$200,000

Gold

$100,000

Silver

$50,000

Bronze

$10,000

Platinum Sponsor


Platinum Sponsors provide $200,000 or more to the foundation. Platinum level sponsorship offers the sponsoring company the highest level of visibility. As a Platinum sponsor, you will also receive benefits in recruiting, consulting, employee training, research collaboration and the development of customized AIOS functionalities. Platinum level sponsors also receive complimentary registration for the AIOS Forum, as well as logo display and advertising opportunities at the forum.


Gold Sponsor


Gold Sponsors provide $100,000 or more to the foundation. Gold level sponsorship offers the sponsoring company a high level of visibility. As a gold sponsor, you will also receive benefits in recruiting, consulting, employee training and research collaboration. Sponsorship at this level includes complimentary registration for the AIOS Forum, as well as logo display and advertising opportunities at the forum.


Silver Sponsor


Silver Sponsors provide $50,000 or more to the foundation. Silver level sponsorship offers the sponsoring company a mid-level of visibility. As a silver sponsor, you will also receive benefits in recruiting, consulting and employee training. Sponsorship at this level includes complimentary registration for the AIOS Forum as well as logo display at the forum.


Bronze Sponsor


Bronze Sponsors provide $10,000 or more to the foundation. Bronze level sponsorship offers visibility to the sponsoring company. As a bronze sponsor, you will also receive benefits in recruiting and consulting. Sponsorship at this level includes complimentary registration for the AIOS Forum as well as logo display at the forum.


Subscribe Our Newsletter get regular updates

AIOS Foundation

AIOS Foundation is committed to building the next-generation Large Language Model Agent Operating System, fostering a thriving open-source AIOS-Agent ecosystem. With its cutting-edge, personalized, and privacy-focused LLM Agent Operating System and revolutionary AIOS-Agent framework, AIOS offers innovative experiences for users and developers in the evolving era of AI.
